item.title: 挪威水电库存低，欧洲电力市场面临收紧风险
item.description: 随着水电出口的减少，挪威南部主要水库的低水位增加了今年冬天整个西北欧电力市场供应紧张的风险。【原文：Low water levels in Norway’s key southern reservoirs are raising the risk of tightly supplied power markets across northwest Europe this winter as hydro exports dwindle.】

item.title: 卡冈亚戈认为采用较低的消费物价指数目标有助于南非债券的发行
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-卡冈亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，正式锁定较低的通胀目标可能会支撑债券收益率再次下跌，自从他宣布南非央行将目标设定在 3% 至 6% 目标区间的底部以来，债券收益率已经大幅下跌。【原文：South Africa’s central bank chief Lesetja Kganyago said that officially locking in a lower inflation goal could underpin another drop in bond yields, which have already fallen sharply since he announced the bank was aiming at the bottom of its 3% to 6% target range.】

item.title: 泰国交易所考虑放宽部分规则以提高市场流动性
item.description: 泰国证券交易所总裁阿萨德-孔西里（Asadej Kongsiri）表示，泰国证券交易所正在考虑放宽部分规则，以提高市场流动性。【原文：The Stock Exchange of Thailand is considering easing some of its rules to boost market liquidity, President Asadej Kongsiri said.】

item.title: 日本执政联盟领导人在担心破裂之际举行会议
item.description: 日本首相高市佐奈惠将于周五下午会见执政联盟的同行，因为人们担心作为国家政治稳定基石的长达 26 年的伙伴关系可能破裂。【原文：Japan’s Sanae Takaichi will meet her ruling coalition counterpart on Friday afternoon, amid fears of a possible rupturing of the 26-year partnership that has been a bedrock for political stability in the nation.】

item.title: 日元进一步下跌，日本财务大臣加强警告
item.description: 尽管日本执政党新领导人努力平息市场担忧，但在周五早些时候日元兑美元汇率创下八个月新低后，日本财务大臣加藤胜信还是加强了对日元走势的警告。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato stepped up his warnings over yen movements, after the currency hit a fresh eight-month low against the dollar early Friday, despite efforts by the ruling party’s new leader to calm market concerns.】

item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Initial public offerings in India could raise as much as $20 billion over the next 12 months, helping the country to cement its position as one of the world’s busiest listings markets, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 参议院通过英伟达和 AMD 对华人工智能芯片出口限制
item.description: 根据参议院通过的立法，先进人工智能芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）和先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced artificial intelligence chipmakers Nvidia Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. would have to ensure US companies get priority access to their products before China under legislation the Senate passed, a setback for the industry’s efforts to block the measure.】

item.title: 中国通过新的出口限制削弱电池供应链的影响力
item.description: 中国对电池供应链的部分环节实施新的出口管制，这是中国政府愿意利用其对能源转型至关重要的行业的主导地位的最新迹象。【原文：China’s new export controls over parts of the battery supply chain are the latest sign Beijing is willing to leverage its dominance over an industry vital to the energy transition.】

item.title: 加密货币运营商 HashKey 据称酝酿今年在香港上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所运营商 HashKey Group 已秘密申请在亚洲金融中心首次公开募股。【原文：HashKey Group, the operator of Hong Kong’s biggest licensed crypto exchange, has confidentially filed for an initial public offering in the Asian financial hub, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 联盟谈判继续在日本举行，四种情况值得考虑
item.description: 日本长期执政党自民党与其联盟伙伴公明党之间的关系正面临着自 1999 年结盟以来的最大考验。【原文：The relationship between Japan’s long-ruling Liberal Democratic Party and its coalition partner Komeito is facing its biggest test since they allied in 1999.】

item.title: 泰国达美股价将因交易所实施限制而下跌
item.description: 泰国最有价值的上市公司台达电子（泰国）有限公司（Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl）的股价在本月创下历史最高涨幅后，因证券交易所对其实施了市场监控措施而将下跌。【原文：Shares of Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl, the country’s most valuable publicly traded company, are set to fall after the stock exchange imposed market surveillance measures on the securities following a record-breaking rally this month.】

item.title: 铜在中国带动的反弹后下跌，供应削减成为焦点
item.description: 由于交易商关注停产问题，铜在反弹至创纪录附近后出现下跌。【原文：Copper declined after rallying to near a record, as traders focused on production outages.】

item.title: 供应过剩导致中国碳价跌至 2023 年以来最低点
item.description: 由于中国的结转规则引发了抛售，中国碳信用额的价格跌至两年多来的最低水平。【原文：Prices of Chinese carbon credits were at the lowest level in more than two years as the nation’s carryover rules triggered a sell-off.】

item.title: 美国芯片业压力增大，台积电、三星成为焦点
item.description: 美国对全球芯片业日益严格的审查使台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司和三星电子公司下周的盈利前景成为焦点。【原文：Rising US scrutiny of the global chip industry puts the spotlight on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s and Samsung Electronics Co.’s earnings outlook next week.】

item.title: Vingroup 为电动汽车充电港寻求 5 亿美元私人信贷
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，越南企业集团 Vingroup JSC 正在寻求 5 亿美元的私人信用贷款，以扩大其在整个地区的电动汽车充电站网络。【原文：Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup JSC is seeking a $500 million private credit loan to expand its electric vehicle charging station network across the region, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本准备迎接新领导人，美国确认贸易协议努力
item.description: 美国和日本确认，在亚洲国家向新领导人过渡之际，两国将继续努力落实贸易协议。【原文：The US and Japan confirmed they will keep up efforts to implement their trade deal as the Asian nation transitions to a new leader.】

item.title: 新西兰的威利斯说合唱团撤资是对资产负债表的明智利用
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，新西兰出售光纤网络运营商Chorus公司无投票权股份的计划是政府更聪明地利用资产负债表的一个例子。【原文：New Zealand’s plan to sell its non-voting stake in fiber optic network operator Chorus is an example of the government using its balance sheet smarter, according to Finance Minister Nicola Willis.】

item.title: 中国债券交易员抢购国库券，流动性膨胀
item.description: 中国在岸国库券在节后拍卖中吸引了投资者的强劲需求，反映出银行系统流动性充裕。【原文：China’s onshore treasury bills drew robust demand among investors at post-holiday auctions, reflecting ample liquidity in the banking system.】

item.title: 苹果公司在重组中将健康和健身部门转移到服务部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司正准备扩大一些高层管理人员的职务，以应对长期担任首席运营官的杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）即将离职的情况。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing to expand the roles of some top executives in response to the pending departure of longtime Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对人工智能和芯片持乐观态度，三星股价有望创新高
item.description: 三星电子公司股价大涨，有望创下收盘历史新高，这得益于投资者对其人工智能芯片潜力的热情，以及对其传统内存业务的新信心。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. shares jumped, on track to close at an all-time high, riding investor enthusiasm for its potential in artificial intelligence chips and renewed confidence in its conventional memory business.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，优衣库仍保持强劲增长，快速零售业因此获益
item.description: 优衣库的所有者Fast Retailing Co.公布北美地区收入和利润实现两位数增长后，其股价攀升至六个月来的最高点，因为该公司在美国的扩张抵御了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统今年早些时候引发的关税波动。【原文：Uniqlo owner Fast Retailing Co.’s shares climbed the most in six months after reporting double-digit revenue and profit growth in North America, as its US expansion defied tariff volatility sparked by President Donald Trump earlier this year.】

item.title: 全球市场飙升，泰国央行担心经济脱节
item.description: 泰国央行认为，全球实体经济与屡创新高的金融市场之间的脱节令人担忧，尽管全球贸易发生了越来越多的变化，但资产价格却在飙升。【原文：The disconnect between the real economy and record-high financial markets worldwide is worrying, according to the Bank of Thailand, as asset prices soar despite mounting shifts in global trade.】

item.title: 墨西哥国会因议员担忧而停止对华关税辩论
item.description: 据一位国会议员透露，墨西哥立法者将在 11 月底之前暂停讨论一项政府提案，即对从中国和几个与墨西哥没有贸易协议的亚洲国家进口的汽车、钢铁和其他产品征收高达 50%的关税。【原文：Mexican lawmakers will pause until late November the discussion of a government proposal to impose tariffs of as much as 50% on cars, steel and other products imported from China and several Asian nations that don’t have a trade deal with the country, according to a top congressman.】

item.title: 大额美元空头正变成投资者的痛苦交易
item.description: 今年以来，在每天 9.6 万亿美元的外汇市场上，押注美元一直是最主要的交易方式，但这一赌注开始步履蹒跚。【原文：Betting against the dollar has been the dominant trade this year in the $9.6 trillion-a-day foreign exchange market, but the wager is starting to stumble.】

item.title: 中国芯片股估值飙升考验交易员耐心
item.description: 在过去几个月里，中国的芯片股在国家自给自足的推动下上演了一出举世瞩目的大涨行情，但一些投资者开始对它们的高估值望而却步。【原文：China’s chip stocks have staged a world-beating rally in the past few months on the nation’s self-sufficiency push, but some investors are beginning to balk at their lofty valuations.】

item.title: 日本顶级银行首席执行官力推人工智能，缓解对人力工作的担忧
item.description: 日本最大金融公司的负责人正竭力消除人们对人工智能会抢走工作岗位的担忧。【原文：The heads of Japan’s biggest financial firms are going out of their way to assuage worries that artificial intelligence will take away jobs.】

item.title: 投资者锁定涨幅，金银从高位回落
item.description: 黄金在上一交易日跌破每盎司 4,000 美元后企稳，而白银的跌幅扩大，因为投资者在白银价格涨至 1980 年以来最高点后获利了结。【原文：Gold steadied after falling below $4,000 an ounce in the previous session, while silver extended losses as investors took profits following a rally that sent prices to the highest since 1980.】

item.title: 新西兰财政部长对经济好转充满信心
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）对该国经济表示乐观，称快速降息将有助于促进今年年底和2026年的经济增长。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis expressed optimism about the country’s economy, saying rapid interest-rate cuts will help boost growth late this year and in 2026.】

item.title: 关注加沙计划和全球供应，石油保持大幅下跌态势
item.description: 由于对中东紧张局势缓解和供应前景持谨慎乐观态度，石油创下一周来最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest decline in a week on cautious optimism about easing tensions in the Middle East and the outlook for supply.】
